topSection.title: Program Overview
topSection.description: The frontend developer program takes the students on a journey through program languages such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript and as well as learning essential frameworks, styles and applications. The program is designed to build on a personâ€™s prior experience in the field, whether professional or academic, and prepares students mainly for a role as Frontend developer, Interface developer, Web developer or Web programmer.
